functional_units.name: Async Streaming Interface for ParsePipeline
functional_units.description: Provides an asynchronous event stream of parsing events via AsyncThrowingStream, exposing structured box lifecycle metadata to consumers.

functional_units.name: ParseEvent Type
functional_units.description: Represents individual parsing events emitted by the ParsePipeline, encapsulating event data and metadata.

functional_units.name: Sendable Conformance for BoxHeader and FourCharCode
functional_units.description: Ensures that these primitive types can be safely used across actors in the async pipeline.

functional_units.name: Unit Tests for Ordered Event Delivery and Error Propagation
functional_units.description: Validates correct ordering of events and proper error handling in the ParsePipeline stream interface.
